duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintaining financial reports, records, and general ledger accounts.
Preparing journal entries, analysis, account reconciliations, and bank account updates.
Contributing to the development and review of annual operating budgets and performance projections.
Maintaining documentation for AP/AR and conducting internal audits.
Assisting the Plant Controller as needed.
Timely escalation of problematic accounts to appropriate management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance required. Master's degree a plus.
